name: Bear McCreary
description:
'''Bear McCreary''' (born February 17, 1979) is an American composer. 

McCreary has been nominated for a [[Primetime Emmy Award]] for [[Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Music Composition for a Series (Original Dramatic Score)|Outstanding Music Composition for a Series]] for his work on season one of ''[[Outlander (TV series)|Outlander]]'' and won one Emmy for [[Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Original Main Title Theme Music|Outstanding Original Main Title Theme Music]] for ''[[Da Vinci's Demons]]''. He is also a two-time winner of both the [[British Academy Games Award for Music]] and [[D.I.C.E. Award for Outstanding Achievement in Original Music Composition]] for his work on ''[[God of War (2018 video game)|God of War]]'' and ''[[God of War Ragnar√∂k]]''.
